gpu_set_tex_max_aniso: With this function you can set the current maximum level of anisotropy when using the tf_anisotropic filter mode (see gpu_get_tex_mip_filter() for more information). The input value must range between 1 and 16.
The maximum level for anisotropic filtering (default: 16)
The above code will check the current maximum anisotropic filtering level and if it is not 8 it is set to 8.
